Meet The Teachers

NMA Faculty

Our teachers are not your typical academic professors. They are career professionals with real-world industry experience dedicated to sharing their knowledge.

See NMA Faculty

About KCC NMA

The New Media Arts (NMA) program is a two year AS degree program at Kapi‘olani Community College (KapCC) in Honolulu, Hawaii. Our mission is to prepare students for employment in the fields of interface design and animation.

Apply Now
